FuncDef: The reset arp anti-attack rate-limit statistics command clears statistics about ARP packets discarded due to rate limiting on an interface. The reset arp anti-attack rate-limit statistics command clears statistics about ARP packets discarded due to rate limiting on an interface.
ExtraInfo: To view statistics about ARP packets discarded due to rate limiting on an interface in a specified period, run the reset arp anti-attack rate-limit statistics command to clear the existing statistics and then run the display arp anti-attack rate-limit statistics command.
